scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a violent act occurring outdoors, with a fortified castle visible in the background. In the foreground, a soldier in ornate armor is shown seizing a baby from a woman who is falling to the ground. The soldier holds a sword aloft, seemingly about to strike. Other soldiers and women are present, some appearing distressed. The ground is rendered with foliage and hints of blood, suggesting a massacre. The overall impression is one of chaos and brutality.
